meanings.sent1: The jelly was the wabbliest dessert at the party.
meanings.sent2: The bridge was the wabbliest structure in the town.
meanings.sent3: The wabbliest chair in the room made everyone nervous.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the wabbliest when she was nervous.
meanings.sent5: The wabbliest tree in the forest swayed in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The wabbliest table in the cafe spilled drinks easily.
meanings.sent2: The old man walked with the wabbliest gait.
meanings.sent3: The wabbliest ladder in the garage was missing a step.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt wabbliest when she stood on stage.
meanings.sent5: The wabbliest ground in the park made it hard to balance.
